Method that takes a player and analyzes his bookshelf to see if there are 2 filled rows, each one made by 5 tiles of 5 different colors, inside it and, in case, returns true.

Method that takes a player and analyzes his bookshelf to see if there are 5 columns of growing or decreasing height, each one that differs from the previous one by a box, inside it and, in case, returns true.

Method that takes a player and analyzes his bookshelf to see if the 4 tiles at the bookshelf's corners have the same color.

Method that takes a player and analyzes his bookshelf to see if there are 2 separate groups, each one made by 4 tiles of the same color disposed in a 2x2 formation, inside it and, in case, returns true.
